title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Online Flipped Learning-Based Inquiry Community Building for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic flipped learning concepts, inquiry-based learning experience, and foundational math pedagogy
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design math projects utilizing the three elements of communities of inquiry (teaching/ social/cognitive presence) in online flipped learning environments
Learners can improve project-based assessment outputs to meet criteria through peer feedback
Learners can analyze flipped learning content and evaluate its connectivity with community of inquiry variables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
